item.title: About
item.description:
Hi there ðŸ‘‹ I’m John! I’m a Software Engineer at Cisco Systems in Raleigh, North Carolina. I work in Cisco’s CollabAI organization doing… well, collaborative AI :) specializing in back-end distributed systems written primarily in Python and Java.

In my free time, I enjoy:

  • Playing Ice Hockey
  • Hobbyist video game development (using primarily the Godot engine)
  • Weight training
  • Books
  • Video games
  • Movies
  • … and a variety of other random things that pop into my brain.

Prior to graduating from NC State:
